advise of your situation.

t Grimlock spewed forth. Too slow, the fire
licked her side.

gh! My Lord, I request permission to deal with this fool

d identified the warrior.

ul Motherload, this is
no ordinary Maximal. Bring me over this scorpion thi=
ng there first.

He rose from his command seat and opened the hatch, the ju=
mped off as
she took him above Skorponok.

Free to fight, Motherload transf=
ormed into a large armored bot and
flew right at Grimlock, preparing to pun=
ch him right in the jaw...
